name: Youtube Playlist JSON
description: Returns JSON of Youtube Playlist using YouTube Data API v3

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: The API Key for the app to use. You can get one here: https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

PLAYLIST_ID.description: The playist to display the JSON of.

CACHE_TIME.description: Amount of time to cache the json for in seconds. ex: 10 times 60 seconds = 600(10 minutes)
